pageSetting.title: 客户存贷款分层分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'
select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT d.TJRQ ,d.JGDH,d.JGMC,d.HZKHS,d.HZHYZB,d.QJMS,d.QJZ,d.QJKHS,d.qjzb from ( SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast(b.hzkhs as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYZB, c.QJMS AS QJMS, C.QJZ AS QJZ, C.KHS AS QJKHS, case when b.khs = 0 then 0 else (cast(c.khs as decimal(25,4))/ cast(b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as qjzb FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( select cast(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs, a.hzkhs, a.jgkhdxdh from ( SELECT KHYE1.KHS, CAST(SUM(KHYE1.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY KHYE1.TJRQ,KHYE1.JXDXLX,KHYE1.KHLX)as decimal(25,4)) as hzkhs, KHYE1.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE1 INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE1.JGKHDXDH WHERE KHYE1.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE1.JXDXLX = $ywlx$ AND KHYE1.KHLX='$khlx$' AND JG.KHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$) ) A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH ,a.hzkhs )B ON B.JGKHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH inner join ( SELECT cast(sum(khye.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs , qjpz.qjz, qjpz.qjms, KHYE.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE INNER JOIN CSB_QJPZ QJPZ ON KHYE.KHYEQJ = QJPZ.QJZ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH AND KHYE.TJRQ BETWEEN QJPZ.QSRQ AND QJPZ.JSRQ AND QJPZ.QJMC = (CASE WHEN $ywlx$=1 AND '$khlx$'='1' THEN 'CKDGKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=1 AND '$khlx$'='2' THEN 'CKDSKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=2 AND '$khlx$'='1' THEN 'DKDGKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=2 AND '$khlx$'='2' THEN 'DKDSKHYEQJ' END) where KHYE.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE.JXDXLX =$ywlx$ AND KHYE.KHLX='$khlx$' and JG.KHDXDH in($jgkhdxdh$) GROUP BY qjpz.qjz, qjpz.qjms, KHYE.JGKHDXDH )c on c.JGKHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH WHERE KHYE.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE.JXDXLX =$ywlx$ AND KHYE.KHLX='$khlx$' and JG.KHDXDH in($jgkhdxdh$) )d group by d.TJRQ ,d.JGDH,d.JGMC,d.HZKHS,d.HZHYZB,d.QJMS,d.QJZ,d.QJKHS,d.qjzb

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT d.TJRQ ,d.JGDH,d.JGMC,d.HZKHS,d.HZHYZB,d.QJMS,d.QJZ,d.QJKHS,d.qjzb from ( SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast(b.hzkhs as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYZB, c.QJMS AS QJMS, C.QJZ AS QJZ, C.KHS AS QJKHS, case when b.khs = 0 then 0 else (cast(c.khs as decimal(25,4))/ cast(b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as qjzb FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( select cast(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs, a.hzkhs, a.jgkhdxdh from ( SELECT KHYE1.KHS, CAST(SUM(KHYE1.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY KHYE1.TJRQ,KHYE1.JXDXLX,KHYE1.KHLX)as decimal(25,4)) as hzkhs, KHYE1.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE1 INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE1.JGKHDXDH WHERE KHYE1.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE1.JXDXLX = $ywlx$ AND KHYE1.KHLX='$khlx$' AND JG.KHDXDH IN($jgkhdxdh$) ) A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH ,a.hzkhs )B ON B.JGKHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH inner join ( SELECT cast(sum(khye.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs , qjpz.qjz, qjpz.qjms, KHYE.JGKHDXDH FROM KHFX_KHYEQJDTJ KHYE INNER JOIN CSB_QJPZ QJPZ ON KHYE.KHYEQJ = QJPZ.QJZ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH AND KHYE.TJRQ BETWEEN QJPZ.QSRQ AND QJPZ.JSRQ AND QJPZ.QJMC = (CASE WHEN $ywlx$=1 AND '$khlx$'='1' THEN 'CKDGKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=1 AND '$khlx$'='2' THEN 'CKDSKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=2 AND '$khlx$'='1' THEN 'DKDGKHYEQJ' WHEN $ywlx$=2 AND '$khlx$'='2' THEN 'DKDSKHYEQJ' END) where KHYE.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE.JXDXLX =$ywlx$ AND KHYE.KHLX='$khlx$' and JG.KHDXDH in($jgkhdxdh$) GROUP BY qjpz.qjz, qjpz.qjms, KHYE.JGKHDXDH )c on c.JGKHDXDH = KHYE.JGKHDXDH WHERE KHYE.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND KHYE.JXDXLX =$ywlx$ AND KHYE.KHLX='$khlx$' and JG.KHDXDH in($jgkhdxdh$) )d group by d.TJRQ ,d.JGDH,d.JGMC,d.HZKHS,d.HZHYZB,d.QJMS,d.QJZ,d.QJKHS,d.qjzb ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'KHLX'
